Tempuh Ratusan Kilometer demi Jumpa Pebalap MotoGP
01 Nov 2019, 20:04 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ilustrasi. (Foto: ANTARA FOTO/Fahrul Jayadiputra)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Malaysia salah satu negara yang memiliki berbagai kondisi jalanan menarik untuk dilalui oleh pengendara sepeda motor. Kondisi ini menarik perhatian banyak riders dari berbagai negara untuk merasakan nikmatnya menaklukkan kuda besi di negeri jiran, Malaysia, contohnya para penggemar motor asal Indonesia.Sebanyak 24 pengendara motor asal Indonesia bertolak ke Malaysia demi merasakan kenikmatan berkendara di jalanan Malaysia dalam gelaran Honda Asian Journey (HAJ) 2019. Rombongan bikers yang berasal dari Jakarta, Yogyakarta, Pontianak, Denpasar, Medan dan Makassar ini menggunakan motor sport Honda. Mereka bergabung dengan 40 pengendara motor negara lain dari Vietnam, Thailand, Malaysia, India dan Filipina.Selama perjalanan touring mulai 31 Oktober sampai 3 November 2019, riders harus melahap total jarak 582 km dari Sepang International Circuit hingga kembali finis di Sepang International Sirkuit untuk menyaksikan langsung MotoGP, pada Minggu (3/11).Sensasi turing yang berbeda dirasakan saat melalui berbagai kondisi jalanan seperti highway, jalan berliku tajam dan berbukit menuju Genting Highland hingga menyusuri kondisi jalanan yang padat lalu lintas di setiap kota yang dilewati.Sepanjang perjalanan, bikers yang terdiri dari pemilik CBR250RR dan Big Bike Honda di Tanah Air ini dapat merasakan karakter sport dari masing-masing CBR Series yang ikut dalam rombongan."Sangat bersemangat bisa mengikuti touring dengan detail yang terencana dengan sangat baik. Bukan hanya bertemu dengan saudara-saudara baru dari berbagai daerah di Indonesia, tapi juga berbagai negara Asia lainnya, meskipun kami berbeda-beda tapi kami merasa menjadi satu saudara di atas roda," kata peserta asal Pontianak Beni Gunawan (33)."Saya sangat berterima kasih bisa diberikan kesempatan langka yang mungkin tidak didapat banyak orang," ucapnya kemudian. Pada hari pertama, para peserta mendapatkan sesi latihan keselamatan berkendara menggunakan motor besar (moge) di kompleks Sepang International Circuit.Sesi latihan ini untuk mengasah kembali keterampilan berkendara dengan moge seperti cara menikung, melakukan pengereman hingga aturan maupun tata cara berkendara di dalam rombongan. Di sela-sela latihan, peserta dikejutkan dengan kehadiran Marc Marquez dan Jorge Lorenzo sebelum menyelesaikan perjalanan satu etape berjarak 115 km.Rute di hari kedua memberikan tantangan tersendiri bagi para peserta turing dalam 4 etape yang ditempuh. Etape pertama, peserta menempuh perjalanan dari Malaka menuju Seremban berjarak 95 km. Setelah beristirahat sejenak, rombongan melanjutkan etape kedua menuju Kuala Selangor. Para bikers dapat merasakan sensasi berkendara di sepanjang etape kedua sejauh 120 km.Etape ketiga ditempuh dengan menikmati jalanan berliku menuju BHP Karak sepanjang 70 km. Kegiatan hari kedua ditutup dengan etape keempat menuju kawasan wisata Genting Highland yang berada 1.700 meter di atas permukaan laut.Di hari ketiga menjadi hari spesial bagi peserta rombongan. Dari ketinggian Genting Highland, mereka melaju ke pusat kota Kuala Lumpur mengunjungi Petronas dan KLCC Tower. Rombongan touring mengabadikan kebersamaan mereka di salah satu lokasi ikonik Malaysia yaitu Twin Tower. Pada malam hari, acara istimewa lainnya pun menyambut para riders karena kembali bertemu dengan pebalap Marc Marquez dan Jorge Lorenzo. Pada hari terakhir peserta menuju Sepang International Circuit untuk menyaksikan penampilan kedua pebalap tersebut di lintasan sirkuit. (ryh/mik)

Automotive Community
Take hundreds of kilometers to meet MotoGP riders
01 Nov 2019, 20:04 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Illustration. (Photo: BETWEEN PHOTOS / Fahrul Jayadiputra)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Malaysia is a country that has a variety of interesting road conditions for motorcyclists to pass. This condition attracts the attention of many riders from various countries to feel the pleasure of conquering an iron horse in the neighboring country, Malaysia, for example, motorcycle enthusiasts from Indonesia. A total of 24 Indonesian motorbike riders departed for Malaysia to feel the pleasure of driving on Malaysian roads in the Honda Asian Journey event ( HAJ) 2019. The group of bikers from Jakarta, Yogyakarta, Pontianak, Denpasar, Medan and Makassar use Honda motorbikes. They joined 40 motorists from other countries from Vietnam, Thailand, Malaysia, India and the Philippines. During the touring trip from 31 October to 3 November 2019, riders had to devour a total distance of 582 km from the Sepang International Circuit to return to finish at the Sepang International Circuit to witness directly MotoGP, on Sunday (3/11). Different touring compensation is felt when going through various road conditions such as highway, sharp and hilly road winding towards Genting Highland to follow the dense road conditions of traffic in every city that is passed. Throughout the trip, bikers which consists of the owner of the CBR250RR and Big Bike Honda in the country, can feel the sporting character of each CBR Series participating in the group. "Very excited to be able to follow the touring with very well planned details. Not just meeting new brothers from various regions in Indonesia, but also various other Asian countries, even "We are different but we feel we are one brother on wheels," said participant from Pontianak Beni Gunawan (33). "I am very grateful to be given a rare opportunity that many people might not get," he said later. On the first day, participants received a driving safety training session using a large motorbike (moge) at the Sepang International Circuit complex. This training session was to re-sharpen riding skills with moge such as cornering, braking to the rules and procedures for driving in the group. On the sidelines of the exercise, participants were surprised by the presence of Marc Marquez and Jorge Lorenzo before completing a stage trip of 115 km. The route on the second day presented a challenge for the participants touring in the 4 stages taken. The first stage, participants traveled from Malacca to Seremban, a distance of 95 km. After resting for a while, the group continued the second stage to Kuala Selangor. The bikers can feel the sensation of driving along the second stage as far as 120 km. The third shot is taken by enjoying the winding road to BHP Karak along 70 km. The second day's activities closed with a fourth stage towards the Genting Highland tourist area which is 1,700 meters above sea level. On the third day it became a special day for group participants. From the height of Genting Highland, they drove to downtown Kuala Lumpur to visit Petronas and KLCC Tower. The touring group enshrined their togetherness in one of Malaysia's iconic locations, Twin Tower. In the evening, another special event also welcomed the riders because they returned to meet riders Marc Marquez and Jorge Lorenzo. On the last day the participants headed for the Sepang International Circuit to witness the appearance of the two riders on the circuit track. (ryh / mic)
